FuncDef: This command controls the period of time that the Registrar state machine will wait in the leave state before transitioning to the MT state when it is removed. An instance of the timer is required for each state machine that is in the leave state. The Leave Period Timer is set to the value leave-time when it is started.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the timer value in 10th of seconds to hold attributes in a leave-state,. Values-30 to 60.
